text: Ti Ɛsedalase losuʋɛ ɓɛtɛni ga gului, gaalɛbai naama vai zu, miná ɠa é ɠɛni loni ná. Nui niiti ti ɠɛni loni zeezazuʋɛ, naati kaa: Matitia, Sema, Anaya, Ilii, Yilikiya, ta Maaseya. Zɔiti ti ɠɛni loni ga kɔʋɛzu ʋelei, naati kaa: Pedaya, Misayɛle, Malikiya, Ɠasume, Ɠasebadana, Zakali, ta Mesulame.
